title: Lemon–Garlic Yogurt Dressing
instructions: In a small bowl, whisk together the Greek yogurt, lemon juice, and olive oil until smooth.
Add the garlic powder, Creole seasoning, and maple syrup.
Whisk again until the dressing is fully combined.
Taste and adjust maple syrup or salt as needed.
Use immediately or refrigerate for up to 3 days.
notes: Great with Creole–Maple chicken, arugula, kale, sweet potato, and chickpeas.
For a thinner dressing, add 1–2 tsp cold water.
